General.Name: Affluent Partners Holdings Limited
General.Description: Affluent Partners Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the purchase, process, design, production, and wholesale distribution of pearls and jewelry products. It operates in two segments, Sales of Pearls and Jewellery Products, and Strategic Investment and Financial Services. The company is also involved in the real estate financial assets investment business. It has operations in Hong Kong, Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Man Sang Jewellery Holdings Limited and changed its name to Affluent Partners Holdings Limited in February 2017. Affluent Partners Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.
